description: Describes the associations between the application and the specified associated resources.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the specified application.

parameters.name: AssociatedResourceTypes
parameters.description: The resource type of the associated resources. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Associations
nested_items.description: List of associations and information about them.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: AssociatedResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type of the associated resource.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: The time the association was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time the association status was last updated.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The status of the application resource association.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason the association deployment failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code of the association deployment failure.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of the association deployment failure.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If you received a NextToken from a previous call that was paginated, provide this token to receive the next set of results.
